title: New google pixel 3 phone, error: couldn't sign in. There was a problem connecting to play.google.com
content:
I'm trying to sign into my Google account on my new pixel. It won't show the login screen and brings up an error message saying "Couldn't sign in. There was a problem connecting to play.google.com." 

I've tried clearing caches, settings, removing accounts, restarting and nothing has worked so far.
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 3
